      AbstractSiteMap parseSiteMap(String contentType, byte[] content, URL url) 
      AbstractSiteMap parseSiteMap(URL onlineSitemapUrl)
      Returns a SiteMap or SiteMapIndex given an online sitemap URL
      Please note that this method is a static method which goes online and fetches the sitemap then parses it

      This method is a convenience method for a user who has a sitemap URL and wants a "Keep it simple" way to parse it.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • isStrict

        public boolean isStrict()
        Returns:
        whether invalid URLs will be rejected

      • parseSiteMap

        public AbstractSiteMap parseSiteMap(URL onlineSitemapUrl)
                             throws UnknownFormatException,
                                    IOException
        Returns a SiteMap or SiteMapIndex given an online sitemap URL
        Please note that this method is a static method which goes online and fetches the sitemap then parses it

        This method is a convenience method for a user who has a sitemap URL and wants a "Keep it simple" way to parse it.
        Parameters:
        onlineSitemapUrl - URL of the online sitemap
        Returns:
        AbstractSiteMap object or null if the onlineSitemap is null
        Throws:
        UnknownFormatException
        IOException

      • parseSiteMap

        public AbstractSiteMap parseSiteMap(String contentType,
                           byte[] content,
                           AbstractSiteMap sitemap)
                             throws UnknownFormatException,
                                    IOException
        Returns a processed copy of an unprocessed sitemap object, i.e. transfer the value of getLastModified and sets the original sitemap to processed.
        Throws:
        UnknownFormatException
        IOException

      • parseSiteMap

        public AbstractSiteMap parseSiteMap(String contentType,
                           byte[] content,
                           URL url)
                             throws UnknownFormatException,
                                    IOException
        Returns:
        SiteMap/SiteMapIndex given a content type, byte content and the URL of a sitemap
        Throws:
        UnknownFormatException
        IOException
